intro.p: Associates a layout name with a controller. The layout can later be changed using the LayoutName property of the Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Controller.

section.title: LayoutAttribute(System.String layoutName)
section.p: Constructs a LayoutAttribute with the layout name.

section.title: BuildLayoutDescriptor() : Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Internal.LayoutDescriptor
section.p: Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Internal.ILayoutDescriptorBuilder implementation. Gets the descriptor that describes the layout.
